column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This place is a Chicago institution and I can see why. We were quoted an hour wait when we arrived at 7:30 p.m. on a Thursday
column2: but they took my cell number and texted me a link to check where we stood in line. Everything was very organized
column3: including the waiter telling us exactly how long it would take to get our wine
column4: salad and pizza. And the spinach salad and Malnati Classic pizza were both delicious. I'll go here every time I'm in Chicago. They have food and customer service down to a science.
